ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We wish to acknowledge the technical support from the staffs at beamline 11C at Pohang Light Source-II (PLS-II), Korea and BL-17A at the Photon factory, Japan, and thank Dr. J. Lee for providing an interface antibody gene (D2 H1-1/H3-1). This work was supported by grants from the strategy (NRF-2016R1E1A1A01942558) and by Korea Drug Development Fund funded by Ministry of Science and ICT, Ministry of Trade, Industry, and Energy, and Ministry of Health and Welfare (KDDF-201712-14).
